Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconTransmitter.NOT_SUPPORTED_MULTIPLE_ADVERTISEMENTS
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.altbeacon.beacon.Region.clone()
    instances of this class are immutable and therefore don't have to be cloned when used in concurrent code.
    org.altbeacon.bluetooth.BluetoothCrashResolver.disableDebug()
    Since the default logger used by the android-beacon-library only logs warnings and above, this method is no logger used. To log debug messages use the Loggers.verboseLogger()
    org.altbeacon.bluetooth.BluetoothCrashResolver.enableDebug()
    Since the default logger used by the android-beacon-library only logs warnings and above, this method is no logger used. To log debug messages use the Loggers.verboseLogger()
    org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconManager.getMonitoringNotifier()
    replaced by (@link #getMonitorNotifiers)
    org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconManager.getRangingNotifier()
    replaced by (@link #getRangeNotifiers)
    org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconManager.logDebug(String, String)
    This will be removed in a later release. Use LogManager.d(String, String, Object...) instead.
    org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconManager.logDebug(String, String, Throwable)
    This will be removed in a later release. Use LogManager.d(Throwable, String, String, Object...) instead.
    org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconManager.setDebug(boolean)
    To be removed in a future release. Use LogManager.setLogger(org.altbeacon.beacon.logging.Logger) instead.
    org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconManager.setMonitorNotifier(MonitorNotifier)
    replaced by (@link #addMonitorNotifier)
    org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconManager.setRangeNotifier(RangeNotifier)
    replaced by (@link #addRangeNotifier)
    org.altbeacon.beacon.Identifier.toUuidString()
    Replaced by stronger typed variant. This mathod returns a string, therefore does not offer type safety on the UUID per se. It was replaced by Identifier.toUuid().
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.altbeacon.beacon.powersave.BackgroundPowerSaver(Context, boolean)
    the countActiveActivityStrategy flag is no longer used.
    org.altbeacon.beacon.Identifier(Identifier)
    objects of this class are immutable and therefore don't have to be cloned when used from multiple threads
